biotools.summary: Cell Behavior Ontology, is designed to describe multi-cell computational models. In particular to describe both the existential behaviors of cells (spatiality, growth, movement, adhesion, death, …) and computational models of those behaviors. It is an OWL-2 ontology developed in Protégé 4.
